articles.title: NASA's DART mission will deliberately crash into an asteroid's moon in the name of planetary defense - CNN
articles.description: NASA's Double Asteroid Redirection Test, a planetary defense mission, will lift off on November 23 from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California. The spacecraft will deliberately crash into a small moon orbiting a near-Earth asteroid.
